name: Violet Glass Ankle T-Shirt with black fallen monkey design
description:
Violet T-Shirt with black "fallen wine glass ankle monkey" design hand drawn by Debbie Hard (http://normalies.tumblr.com/) 

These T-Shirts were manufactured by Gildan (www.gildan.com). and fit very nicely.

Available in S, M and L sizes.

Here are the dimensions:
Small - Width: 45.72cm, Length: 71.17cm
Medium - Width: 50.1cm, Length: 73.66cm
Large - Width:  55.88cm, Length: 76.2cm 

We only have a limited amount of these special edition tees so move swiftly to claim yours!

name: Ltd. Edition Glass Ankle Monkey
description: All Glass Ankle monkeys are completely hand-knitted. They all have their own different characteristics and personalities and are guaranteed to bring good-hearted mischief to the lives of their owner.
